page.title: 11HEALTH:FENNY COMPTON.
page.content: Generally, local health is very good, and people live to about 80+ without serious illness.Climate & living conditions combined with excellent medical care make this possible. The local {SURGERY}is sited in a converted yeoman's house,and is run by a team of 3 Doctors,headed by Peter Christopher, backed by 4 staff.About 50 patients a day go to the Surgery,serious illness beng treated at {HOSPITAL} in Banbury, Leamington or Warwick.If required, the Doctors visit patients in their own homes, working in shifts, with one Doctor always on 24 hour all.There is an {AMBULANCE SERVICE} available as needed as transport to Hospital. This service works closely with the{POLICE and the {FIRE SERVICE} especially in the ase of Road Accidents or house fires.The{SCHOOL MEDICAL SERVICE } helps to look after schoolchildren.
